Description: identifies either city level or tract level

at city-level, it is the fips code of cityfips. for tract-level data, it is a combined id of cityfips and tractfips for tracts within the respective city with the exception of honolulu, which only uses tractfips
the data value unit, such as "%" for percentage
identifier for the data value type
the data type, such as age-adjusted prevalence or crude prevalence
latitude, longitude of city or census tract centroid
